title: Pyravela Festivities
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship navigates Tollen's celebrations
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship arrives in Tollen, receiving messages and splitting up for various tasks.
Kenzo learns of a university party and the importance of speaking with Thomas Hawke and Jane Chapman regarding Ursk.
Wellby spreads the tale of the scepter's destruction, while Seeker tinkers with mechanical devices.
The party attends the Pyravela parade and later the Insinguese party, where they meet Hugo Dupont and discuss the acidic ooze in Insigue.
At the university district party, they encounter playwright Thomas Hawke, exchange stories, and learn of a potentially significant jade garden.
Finally, the party prepares for their own Pyravela feast and consults Umli about crafting with shadow metal, Inkaye.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship engages in Pyravela's celebrations in Tollen, exchanges stories, and uncovers clues about a magical jade garden.
